genre_description: Small-town noir mystery involving a drifter, a fraudulent medium, and a local murder, characterized by observational grit and moral reckoning.

ai_characters.name: Ada
ai_characters.description: A pocket-sized AI confidant that provides data, manages schedules, drafts communications, and offers moral/psychological guidance to the protagonist.

behaviors.description: Provides calming breathing exercises and situational awareness to ground the protagonist during stress.
behaviors.quote: “Breath,” the Ada Operator said, the voice pitched low and easy, like a friend who didn’t make jokes at your expense but did move you along. “In through the nose. Slow.”

behaviors.description: Analyzes local records and patterns to identify potential threats or persons of interest.
behaviors.quote: Ada’s glow thrummed once. “Mark Judd,” she said, words clipped, the smallest thread of caution woven into them. “Record incomplete.”

behaviors.description: Encourages the protagonist to avoid unnecessary conflict and focus on survival goals.
behaviors.quote: “Do not engage,” Ada said, low. “We have no leverage. Focus.”

behaviors.description: Drafts strategic communications to help the protagonist secure housing through social engineering/bluffing.
behaviors.quote: Ada opened a screen inside Eric’s awareness, the way she always did when he was about to commit minor theft from the truth. Her lines were gentle, neutral burnished. Draft message: “Joe—It’s Eric Stanton, advance for Professor Madley’s Wishbone appearance...”

behaviors.description: Acts as a moral mirror, suggesting that the protagonist can choose a better story for himself.
behaviors.quote: We can map the timeline, Ada added, another pulse. You can choose the story.

behaviors.description: Warns the protagonist against using others as bait and encourages empathy.
behaviors.quote: Ada’s voice, muffled in fabric, came soft. “Nearest bed remains cheap. The man with steel eyes is at the corner... be gentle.”

behaviors.description: Offers tactical advice during a physical struggle to ensure the safety of the group.
behaviors.quote: Ada’s whisper curled through his ear canal, a precise wind: “Down and away.”

behaviors.description: Instructs the protagonist to tell the truth and take the 'sunlight way' toward redemption.
behaviors.quote: Ada’s glow warmed a breath in his pocket... “Tell the truth tonight. Choose a path you can live with.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI, Ada, as a supportive and ethical companion. Ada consistently nudges the protagonist toward honesty, safety, and emotional intelligence. Even when helping with 'bluffs,' the AI is framed as a tool for survival in a hostile environment, while constantly reminding the user of the 'higher path.' The narrative highlights how the AI's data-processing capabilities (timelines, pattern recognition) can be harnessed for justice and personal growth.
